Job Overview

Join Accopixel Technologies as a Python Developer Intern and become an integral part of our IT Services and Consulting team. This remote, full-time internship offers aspiring freshers, with 0-1 years of experience, a chance to work from various locations including Bengaluru, Chennai, Pune, Ahmedabad, Navi Mumbai, Delhi, or Hyderabad. In this role, you will grow your technical skills and contribute to innovative projects that challenge the norm and push boundaries.

It is very important to fill the form. You will receive Form when you will apply as well as fill your mail Id.

Qualifications And Skills

Proficiency in Python programming (Mandatory skill), essential for building robust and scalable applications.
Strong problem-solving abilities (Mandatory skill) to effectively troubleshoot and resolve technical issues.
Understanding of web development (Mandatory skill), including front-end and back-end technologies.
Familiarity with data structures and algorithms, forming the foundational concepts required for efficient coding.
Experience with object-oriented programming to develop reusable and maintainable code structures.
Basic knowledge of database management, enabling interaction and manipulation of stored data.
Understanding of version control systems, crucial for collaborative project management and handling source code versions.
Ability to work in a team environment, demonstrating adaptability and collaborative spirit to achieve shared objectives.

Roles And Responsibilities

Assist in designing, developing, and deploying efficient software solutions using Python and related frameworks.
Collaborate with senior developers to incorporate user needs into project specifications, ensuring relevancy and usability.
Participate in code reviews and testing processes to ensure code quality and maintainability.
Contribute to documentation efforts for coding processes, system designs, and development workflows.
Engage in continuous learning to enhance technical skills and apply updated practices to your work.
Support client interactions to understand project demands and report on progress effectively.
Implement feedback and gain insights from seasoned team members to refine your development approaches.
Utilize problem-solving skills to identify bugs and craft optimal solutions for software improvements.
